items.sentence: Tom was standing at the bar when I walked into the club.
Perhaps we shouldn\'t be doing this without Tom\'s help.
Tom put on oven mitts and took the cake out of the oven.
Tom reads the newspaper on the train on his way to work.
Tom realized there was nothing he could do to help Mary.
Tom was the first one to realize Mary wanted to do that.
Tom advised me to sell the farm and live somewhere else.
Tom and John both said that they were in love with Mary.
Tom isn\'t here because he\'s in Boston at a conference.
Tom became aware that he had forgotten to tie his shoes.
Tom built a house on the land he bought three years ago.
Tom thought Mary would like to go to Boston to see John.
I\'m often mistaken for a girl because I have long hair.
You should tell Tom that Mary is planning on doing that.
When was the last time you told your wife you loved her?
When I was a child, my parents often bought toys for me.
Tom said he had to do some things he didn\'t want to do.
I don\'t suppose there\'s much chance of that happening.
I don\'t think I\'ll be able to convince Tom to do that.
Tom didn\'t seem to want to tell me why he\'d done that.
